Not reliable. Not professional. Not worth the game of frustration or traffick when they’re listed as open and in fact, are not.

name: Tiffany Vidal
text: As soon as I walked in, there were 3 girls sitting on the floor in the middle of the salon. I looked back to make sure I was even in the right place, but unfortunately I was. They all looked at me which added on to the awkward vibe. Not one of them said a word to me, so I assumed they were waiting to have their eyebrows done. So I just stayed back and waited bc the reviews to this shop were very good so I wanted to see what it was all about. After 5ish minutes a girl get into the chair and one of the other girls starts on her eyebrows. I'm still waiting patiently in the corner when the girl who's fixing the other girls eyebrows says it'll be about 20 minutes before she starts mine. So I'm still like, okay, whatever. Reviews are good, I'll just wait. The entire time I'm waiting there, they're talking about some personal issues which honestly I  probably didn't even want to hear/know. It's been about 15 minutes and the girl in the chair gets up, so casually I start making my way over when the other girl who was on the floor gets into the chair. At this point I decide it's not worth getting my eyebrows done @ this store for the price & lack of professionalism. Needless to say I just walked out & went elsewhere.

resp.text: Im sorry about your bad experience here. But in a salon environment people talk and vent about their personal lives sometimes. Im the owner, and the only one who works here and i always make sure to at least greet when someone walks in if im busy. As for the people sitting on the floor, they were young girls, and if they want to sit on the floor and hangout, they can. They were waiting to get their eyebrows done. If i told you it would be 20 minutes before starting on yours, than thats about how long it would take. 20 minutes is much better than going to a nail salon to wait an hour just to have them wax both of your eyebrows off. But im glad you left, since you feel that theres so much wrong in here. I don’t need your negativity in my business. I charge for my work and talent, not what you think i should charge. I am very professional and respectful with my clients, but im also a human being who makes mistakes. I am sorry i did not meet your high expectations, but I guarantee you this, you would have been more than satisfied with your eyebrows. Thanks!

text: He is a great doctor.

name: Kim Sirmans
text: I went to Dr. Stewart in desperation after going to another dermatology clinic for several months trying to help my daughter with a horrible problem on her foot. We first went in for her bc she had one plantar wart on her foot. They cut it open (to do the nitrogen freeze treatment) but then it just spread like wildfire. We went to this  dermatology office several times over several months and the problem just continued to get worse. I kept doing exactly what they said to do  (religiously, every day, and very carefully) and it wasn’t helping. So I called Dr. Stewart’s office and explained our situation. He said it was the worst case he’d seen in a child and gave us our options. He told us he could laser them off that very day and she could leave his office that day without any more warts on her foot. This option was never given to us at the other office (probably bc we never got to see the actual derm- we always saw the nurse practitioner and i don’t know if they are able to do the laser). Anyway, my daughter was so scared but his staff were all so kind and wonderful and helped her so much to be brave and feel comfortable. Dr. Stewart then did as promised and gave us good instructions on what we needed to do to care for it after we left. After that he followed up with me from his personal cell phone several times to make sure she was doing ok and to guide me through caring for her. He did a fantastic job and she no longer has to deal with the pain or embarrassment bc of him and his giving us other options than we’d been given before. It was clear that he really cared and was so thoughtful and kind to us. He is a great doctor- we are lucky to have him one Auburn/ Opelika!

name: Caylor Jarvis
text: Dr. Stewart is AMAZING and he has a very friendly staff! I would highly recommend Stewart Dermatology!

name: Jake Stewart
text:
If you value your time, you'll need to find a different dermatologist because the folks here do not respect you or your time.

I waited for a month to have an appointment only to wait 1 hour and 17 minutes in the lobby without ever seeing a nurse or doctor.

I did, however, see no fewer than 2 vendors/pharmaceutical reps go in the back office. And with nearly 20 patients in the waiting room, it's easy to see what this doctors priorities are.

They were paper thin… even thinner than they were before growing them out. I told her she made them way too thin and she proceeded to gaslight me and deny she did anything wrong. In the end I ended up with paper thin “sperm” brows that were completely asymmetrical with one arched and the other straight. I couldn’t even drive home after this I just cried in my car. They don’t even have the decency to apologize at this place. If you value your looks and self esteem at all, RUN not walk away from this place.

name: Shay
text: I was nervous at first, being that I am a Black woman and a plus size woman. However, when I walked in, Ms. Ellen made me feel so comfortable! She so kind and professional. Lauren is great, too! These are my go-to girls for all my sugaring needs. Lauren saved my life with a last minute service. They're great people and I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Cindy Howard
text: Jennifer Lambert is amazing! She was very helpful, professional, and did a fabulous job! I love the way my eyelashes look now, they went from barely there to luscious, I never want to be without extensions again. I would give her more than five stars if that was an option. LOVED HER!

name: Vernon Blake
text:
Love your new office!

Easy to find and access, plenty of free parking, nice waiting room, and very clean bathroom. Treatment room is clean, uncluttered, organized, private, and comfortable.

For anyone feeling a bit uncomfortable about any of the procedures or her facility, Ellen is very professional, has an excellent bedside manner, and will put your mind at ease.

Her expertise, experience, and passion for what she does is second-to-none!

resp.text: Thanks Vernon!! Everyone Loves my new location! Thanks you for your referral too!

name: Shelley Belly
text:
Thanks for the great Body Sugaring job you did, Ellen. I was a little nervous getting it ALL done but you really made me feel comfortable & I didn't feel nervous or embarrassed!  You are SO easy to talk to. Thanks for answering my million questions about hair removal. ;-).

PS:  your rooms are magnificent!  I felt like I was in a luxury spa (& I've been to a few!). I'll see you again soon. I have already recommended you to all my friends.

Thanks again - so much!

resp.text:
Hello Shelley!

Thank you for taking the time to visit my Google+ page and to leave this wonderful review.

I really enjoyed chatting with you - you were a lot of fun - and I appreciated all the questions you asked.

Intimate hair removal can be daunting for some, I know, so I'm glad that I put you at ease and that you felt comfortable, and are returning to continue with the process of hair removal.

I decorated my rooms myself, so thank you for the compliment!  I, like you, place hygiene and sanitation and cleanliness at the top of my list in my business.

I look forward to seeing you again soon.

Regards
Ellen

name: Lana Grier
text: I was c onfused regarding the various types of professional hair removal techniques. Ellen explained the differences between Electrolysis and Laser hair removal, as well as the advantages of Sugaring over traditional waxing. She was knowledgeable, friendly and patient, answering all of my questions so I could make an informed decision. Very much appreciated!

resp.text: Hi Lana, thank you for the kind review! I never get tired of discussing hair removal techniques. An educated client makes the best customer... it's a win-win! You're not alone regarding your confusion about electrolysis and laser hair removal treatments. I think most people are unaware they are two entirely different technologies, and one is MUCH better than the other... and yes... ELECTROLYSIS is the winner!!!

name: Taneshia Phomsavanh
text: Went here before and recieved amazing service.  Recently tried to book appt. And no one answered or called me back.  Maybe she went out of business.  Idk.

name: Taylor Reece
text: Thanks Ellen for the electrolysis you did on my neck and face. I highly recommend you to anyone. Love not having to shave my 5 o'clock shading constantly and no more razor burn.

resp.text:
Thank you, Taylor, for giving us the opportunity to assist you.  As you know, Electrolysis is the only FDA approved method of Permanent Hair Removal, and we thrilled that you're so pleased with the results.  Thank you, also, for taking the time to share your experience with others so that they too may benefit from professional hair removal.

Hide that razor!  :-)

name: C Bella
text:
Ashley is my wax specialist at the Birmingham location and she's amazing.  She's been doing my wax for about 5-6 months.  She does a great job and is super friendly and professional.  Highly recommend her and EWC.
I've been a customer of EWC since around 2016/2017 when I moved to the Gulf Coast area and had to find a new wax place since I had previously used a locally owned wax spa in Birmingham.  While living on the Gulf Coast, I patronized the New Orleans, LA, Diberville, MS, and Slidell, LA EWC locations.
The Slidell, LA and Birmingham locations are the best locations of the four I've tried.  I've been getting a full Brazilian bikini wax for 10-11 years now so I know a great wax specialist when I find one...And if you're wondering, yes, I have a wax pass.  Applicable service: Full Brazilian Bikini Wax.

name: Danesha Clarke
text:
I booked a Saturday appointment with European Wax Center on Thursday. In order to travel I need a Covid test which was also booked for Saturday.
I got tested that morning but waiting on the results was going to make the appointment difficult to make. Realizing this, I called to ask if the time could be pushed back; they were booked and said it could not be changed.
We got the results in enough time for me to make the appointment. I called to say that I was on my way and the person on the phone told me the waxer was uncomfortable waxing me.
I let her know that the covid test was a requirement for travel and I had not been in contact with anyone with covid and already received the negative result.

She then said they usually don't come back that quickly, and would have to reschedule.

I understand taking precautions, but I had just recieved a negative result. It's also likely that persons with Covid-19 are actively patronizing their location.
However,  because they were aware that I took the test I was unable to go to my appointment. Very disappointing.

Then as I’m driving from a long distance from where I stay. I received a call saying that the other person we were scheduled with could not do it and if we did come they could try and if she was to do it she could only do one. But overall it’s not guaranteed. So I go into the center to cancel the appointment since I was already in the area to and the receptionist made no eye contact or let me know that everything was canceled. I had to ask her was it completed. She didn’t even say have a good day. She was a black girl with short hair. We stay about 45 minutes away and came together. The appointments was at 2:30 and 3:00. We are first time guest and We will not be coming back.

Still haven't heard from them. Don't go here. Go to LA Bikini. They charge to much at EWC for a half done job.

text: I just wanted to comment on yet another wonderful experience I had last weekend (11/18/2017). Lindsey took great care of me and she made sure I left satisfied. She is personable and efficient; I couldn't ask for anyone any better!

name: Corinna Bass
text:
I got a free wax from the Southern Women's Show from European Wax Center.  I called to make an appointment and was in the same day!  Doug Baker Blvd is definitely all the way down Hwy 280 from where I live in Homewood, however, the clean space I walked into was worth the drive!
The whole place is very streamlined and beautiful.   The products are beautifully displayed on the wall along with descriptions.
The receptionist was a very informative, sweet young lady that even gave me free samples when I showed interest, but did not purchase that day, which I loved!  (Some places feel "pushy" but here, I was very comfortable and left feeling pampered.)
The best part is, if you have never been, you can receive a free wax, and I love 'trying before buying!'
Tell them Corinna sent you!

resp.text: Hi Corinna! We love having you at our center and are happy to hear you had a great experience. See you soon!

text: Had a fantastic appointment with Amaryllis today and couldn’t be more satisfied. As an esthetician myself, I immediately worried about everything that could go wrong. She knows what she’s doing and she’s very personable. As a waxer myself, I know how important it is to be funny and have good conversation during such a long and intimate wax. So it was comfortable and great! I hate waxing myself so Amaryllis will definitely be my new go-to! No more doing acrobatics to try and wax myself!

resp.text: Molly, thank you so much for the positive review! We hope you have a great day!

The waxer I use now is Abbey and she's great!

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Etoria and Abbey. Have a great day!

name: Chasity Pouge
text: I used to rave about this place but lately it has not been the best experience. The turnover is high which is bad enough but they will cancel your appointment at the last minute and then when I came in for my new rescheduled appointment I wasn’t even acknowledged by the receptionists. Yes plural because there was 2.  The usual receptionist knows me by face so I guess I didn’t think nothing of it when those two said nothing to me since they seemed preoccupied...one with another customer and the other took a call on her cell and stepped away. I waited 30 mins to find out that my rescheduled appointment needed to be cancelled because the tech had a family emergency and she left. Walked right pass me!  I finally got to my breaking point and acknowledged the 2 ladies and they had no excuses that made any sense. One of them said she thought I was someone else so I guess we all look alike to her but ok and the other one said with all honesty she simply said you are right we said nothing to you. She was the one who took the call on her cell. Ok so the only wax tech that was still there had I guess turned her wax up and said she could wax me but I needed to give her wax time to cool or I could reschedule again. I opted to wait another 15 mins to let it cool. I must say she was good and this my first time with her but she was actually super nice and I apologized for getting rowdy to her that is just how good she was. As I was leaving the 2 ladies in the front wanted to offer me something for my inconvenience but I got prepaid wax passes so there no credit that could be given so they opted to give me samples which I took cause no one has ever given me samples at this place. It’s sample though so I dunno if that is something spectacular. I asked for a number for management and they said that the manager would have to call me. That’s been a month ago and no call but my $121 pre paid wax pass payment just hit my card again today.  I see that isn’t being rescheduled!  So I said all this to say I might be calling the number and asking for a manager again and getting funds reversed because I can not keep coming to a sinking ship.  Maybe I will do a dispute with my bank and bypass trying to talk to anyone since I never got that call to begin with.

resp.text: Chasity Pouge, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Thanks for bringing this matter to our attention. We would like to get more details about this; please reach out to us at your earliest convenience at  205.637.32.01.

name: Caitlin Carson
text:
DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY! Awkward ...overpriced and unsure of the experience of the technician (this place charges twice the going rate in our area and the service is not half as good as the other places!)

When I arrived the check in process was a little intrusive. The girl at the front desk wanted to see my driver’s license? I’ve been to several spas and had many waxes and never have been asked for a copy of my drivers license. That seems a little extreme for a spa service? But okay. I go to the restroom before my appt starts and when I’m walking back to the waiting area someone calls out my name from a room ..It was my technician (first visit at this place and don’t remember her name)? I felt like that was forward (but not so much so that it ruined the appt). However, then I step into my room and the technician tells me to undress from the waist down that she will do my brows first then my Brazillian ?!? So I don’t have a choice in this and have to lay there EXPOSED while my brows are being done?!? Not only that she didn’t go anywhere! She did not leave the room for me to undress and just stayed in there!?! That’s not typical. Every place I’ve ever been (and I’ve been to many saloons and spas) has always left me in the room to undress then they would come in. More so  than that I’m usually given something to cover up with until the service is needed in that area (unless it’s just a Brazillian that we go straight to). I did not like that!! It was strange and the technician didn’t say a word while she was working which makes things even more awkward!! Oh except for the “shave shaming” as if that’s the reason for the horrible pain that I feel when my hair is being ripped out of my skin around my pubic bone! Lol ?!? So the technician had a dry personality (looking back she seemed weird) ..I had to lay on the table exposed while my brows were getting done first (I didn’t have a choice in that or wasn’t told I did). Also, she stays in the room while I change!!! And when it’s over she stays in the room waiting for me to get dressed!! There was absolutely no concern for privacy or customary respect and boundaries. I much prefer the other place that I go (Marci’s Hoover). The prices are better. The experience isn’t creepy weird or demeaning and my technician is friendly and speaks!

Oh and heads up anyone who gets a brow wax, the technician removed all of my make up then waxed my brows! I told her that I prefer that she just get the strays outside of my make up. My brows are thinning and I have a particular shape that I prefer! That was not respected at all!! There is NO need to remove the make up first of all. (That’s just some personal preference of the technician). That should be the clients choice! We should be able to change without someone watching us when we arrive and before we leave!! There’s no way this place will stay around much longer if things don’t change! Why would anyone continue to pay twice the price for a worse experience!? It’s a strip mall wax place just like Marci’s ..only they advertise like it’s some type of luxury saloon. It’s not..thank goodness they didn’t try to sell me products or some membership. I hate it when I’m paying for a service and still being subjected to high pressure sales. So that is a bonus. To add to the bad experience my wax took close to 30 minutes! It’s never taken that long anywhere else. I don’t think the technician was very experienced. I also felt it was a little creepy that she didn’t say much at all but that she just stays in the room while I’m changing out and back into my clothes. When I was leaving I felt rushed, she was standing with her hand in the door watching me put my shoes on!! I felt rushed cuz her next appt was there! I mean give a a girl some space!

To the management: you need to take note of the things I’ve said. The only people  who wouldn’t be bothered by those things likely don’t know any better and probably haven’t been to other saloons.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 637-3201. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Keri McDonald
text: Best wax ever. I’ve been going for awhile now. Ask for Lindsey she is the best. Very informative, quick, efficient, and really sweet.

name: Staci Galey
text: Friendly staff from the moment I walked in. Adrian was my waxer and was so good at her job and quick. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Staci, thank you so much for your positive comments about European Wax Center! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Minjee Kim
text: It was my first waxing and Eetoria made everything so comforting and easy! She explained everything fully and the waxing itself was not bad at all. I will definitely come to this place next time.

name: Alicia Hayes
text: Loved the ladies there... Super friendly and didn't make me feel akward for my first time! Will be back soon!!!

resp.text: Alicia Hayes, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at European Wax Center! We hope to see you soon!

name: Liz Love
text: I love going to this place! The reception ladies are always super nice! And Lindsey is hands down the best waxer!! She’s super friendly, incredibly knowledgeable, and she always makes you feel comfortable!! Great job guys!

name: Jora_Fjord
text: As a newbie of the waxing world, I was super nervous when I decided to get a Brazilian wax done. I saw Lindsey and I have stuck with her ever since. She is awesome! She made me feel super welcome and kept me laughing and distracted the whole time. She talked me through each step and was patient with me and she made sure I was happy with the result before she was done. If you want to see someone who can make you laugh your anxiety away and feel as comfortable as possible then I highly recommend seeing Lindsey!

name: Alexis Green
text: I was excited to get my eyebrows done here because my mom had been talking about how good they did hers and how painless it was. But my experience here completely differed. When I was getting my eyebrows waxed, I suffered through like 10 minutes of painful plucking after getting them already waxed for them to barely look different from before hand. There were little places where you could tell more hair was pulled. I personally was just not satisfied and have gotten better eyebrow waxing from nail salons for 15 dollars. I geuss the experience all depends on the person who does it.

name: Deaunqua Bryant
text: I have used many European Wax Center locations and I can honestly say that the staff her is unparalleled. My esthetician Etoria did an amazing job and kept me as clean as possible as painless as possible and Cassandra made check in and check out super simple.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Michael
text: Walked in with my fiancée at 5pm today (Saturday) thinking they closed at 6. There wasn't anyone at the front desk so we took a seat - some people were in the back and noticed us but didn't say anything to us. Then I guess the front desk girl got back with some ice cream or something and that's when we found out they only take appointments(?) and even though they're still open for an hour and everyone is just chilling in the back talking there's just absolutely no way possible to fit us in for anything. It would have been understandable if she wasn't basically laughing at us for asking.

name: Tracey Gamble
text: Lindsey was super awesome and made me feel very comfortable during her service. I was literally scared out of my mind because it was my first time and just knew the pain was going to be intense. For the very first time it wasn't bad at all. Glad I got it done.

name: Berry Lafontaine
text: I had been looking around for a place to get a Brazilian done. I heard of this place on the radio and figured I'd give it a shot. The place was clean, people were nice. I was scared of showing my girly bits to a stranger but Adrian was very professional and made me feel not so very self conscious. I will be going here again.

name: Ericka Willis
text: I had a great experience. Adrian made me feel very comfortable. Extremely professional and wonderful staff.

name: Amanda Thomas
text: great service

resp.text: Hi Amanda! We love having you at our center and are happy to hear you had a great experience. See you soon!

name: Chandler Crane
text: I scheduled for two services to be done at 4:30 PM. After calling to confirm and make sure I had my appointment time right, I drove ONE HOUR AND FOURTY FIVE MINUTES because I loved this business. When I arrive at the opposite end of highway 280, I'm informed they will not be able to accommodate both services, but I could reschedule and come back. No one called to tell me that I was coming to an appointment that was going to be cut short or cancelled. When I called three hours before, no one took the opportunity to say "we're a little backed up," or I wouldn't have driven so far, especially in HWY 280 traffic. This whole experience has been terrible. I'll not ever go back or rep your services.

name: MJ D
text: This place is great, ask for Keshia. She does excellent work.

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Keshia. Have a great day!

name: Skylar Culpepper
text: I really loved how my wax specialist Adrian made my experience so comfortable and she was very professional! Definitely coming back!

name: Jordan Johnson
text: Lindsey is super professional and friendly; walked me through the european wax process and got me in and out within 20 minutes. Been getting waxes for 2 yrs and definitely is the most painless wax ive ever had. Also very clean facility and rooms. Definitely coming back!

name: Arkieda Dixon
text: My first time getting a wax and it was great. Etoria is the person who did my wax and she was wonderful, she made me comfortable and made the experience stress free and painless.

name: aiyana hickey
text: OMG! I had a great experience coming here. The facility is very clean and the front desk staff was amazing and super professional and helpful. Shelby the estetician was amazing. I had a full Brazilian and eyebrow done and though I am no novice to waxing she has to be one of the best that I've had and the quality was amazing. Pain was at a minimum and I was left very clean. I look forward to coming back again for more services.

name: Joy Menafee
text: My experience was great! Make sure to ask for Brooke!! She’s a great esthetician and will definitely make you feel comfortable!!!

name: Brianna Taylor
text: It was my first time & it was better than I anticipated. Etoria is a gem & I will be coming back in 4 wks! It's worth a shot ladies

name: Valeria Arruda Nunes
text:
I have been having waxes for years and This was by far the best wax i've ever had, didn't feel a thing and Etoria made sure everything was gone. best wax I've ever had.
Etoria made me feel so relaxed and comfortable and it was the most painless experience a wax could be, lot of attention to detail too, she is amazing and I highly recommend her.

name: Nurse Stacey
text:
Let me start off by saying...I wish the location was more convenient instead of 6 miles down 280 🙄
However, this is by far the Best waxing facility in Birmingham & Hoover!!! Clean, modern, national franchise (brazilian wax by Marci comes out of a crockpot for gods sake)
Ask for BROOKE!! She's professioanl, precise, and personable! She even takes the time to tweeze those stubborn hairs that didn't cooperate with wax!!

name: Jordan Highsmith
text: I’ve been going to EWC since it opened and I love it. The women are so professional and always make it a great visit.

name: Lindsay Williams
text: So thankful to finally have a place like this to serve our area. The hard wax is WONDERFUL, and I highly recommend booking with Brooke.

name: April Cano
text: I've been coming here to get my eyebrows waxed for awhile,  the Girls do a good job and the Wax they use is different than others which I like . I wish they would have protective liners on the Tables though.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us!  On your next visit, please let us know which table liners you prefer.  We follow the industry standards with the exam/table liners.  Thank you!

name: ASHLEY LAUREN HATTER
text: This is my second time coming to EWC and I’m still in love. My wax specialist Etoria is AMAZING!!!

name: SJ M
text: Excellent service, extremely thorough. The facility was very clean and discrete and the team members were super knowledgable and friendly.

name: Nadia Al-Kahlout
text: I’ve worked here as a guest service associate and have tried every waxer up until I left. The only reason I keep coming back is because of Adrian. She is by far the best waxer. She makes sure that it’s as painless as possible, she follows every step necessary to ensure sanitation is correct and that you leave with flawless skin. I can’t stress how much of an amazing waxer she is. I may not get the discount I once did while working there, but honestly I don’t care. She makes sure that my money is well spent. Amazing eyebrows and Brazilian. And she will give you helpful tips on how to ensure that your waxing experience is amazing. I suggest making an appointment with her. You won’t regret it.

name: Raven Gober
text: Adrian is amazing! Highly recommend her and this facility.

name: Ricaundria Joseph
text: I got my first Brazilian wax here months ago and I’ve been hooked every since. I recommend booking Adrian she always makes me feel comfortable and she does a great job!

name: Katherine Armstrong
text:
I went in yesterday for a Brazillian wax. I've had many before at EWC, so I knew the kind of pain that I was in store for. I have sensitive skin and a low pain tolerance, so as always, I was very nervous.

However, yesterday's session was by far the best wax I've ever had. It was all thanks to the wax specialist, Lindsey.

She was the kindest, most encouraging woman I've ever had at EWC. Not only was she fast and did an excellent job, she made sure I was comfortable the entire time. She constantly asked, "Are you okay?" and said, "I'm so proud of you, you're doing so well!"

To say I was happy with the service is a complete understatement. I will definitely be asking for Lindsey every time I go to EWC, whether it's in Tuscaloosa or Birmingham.

Thank you, Lindsey!

name: Mike Brooks
text: Wife and I both love this place.  Friendly staff and very professional.  Also very surprised how little it hurt.

name: Myra Harris
text: Lindsey is amazing. She made something that would usually bring tears to my eyes go smoothly.

name: Brooke Espinosa
text: Etoria did an amazing job, and the front desk is very helpful!

name: John Morton

text: Great experience at European wax Birmingham! Visiting from out of state and Laney was amazing! Will be back when visiting Birmingham again!

resp.text: Hi Emily. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Laney. Have a great day!

name: Tori W
text: Ashley was very fast and friendly!

name: Chandler Thurmond
text: I’m a first time waxer and I’m am blown away by how amazing the experience was. Laney was awesome and made me feel comfortable!

resp.text: Hi Chandler. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Laney. Have a great day!

name: Elizabeth Gunter
text: Dejah did an great job!

name: Anna Mcpoland
text: As soon as me and my friend got there we were rushed. We were choosing our color for pedicures and the technician rushed us to choose the color. They came up to us about 4 times and we had JUST got there. We proceeded to sit down in the chairs and the technicians started pulling the ingrown nails on our toes which HURT. one of the technicians even asked my friend if it hurt.. then proceeded to smile about it. This left the skin on my toes with chunks missing from them doing this. Also the paint job is horrible. I had some knicks on my polish before i even made it home and the polish job was something i could have done. What a waste of 40 dollars. Don’t waste your time going to this place and save your money.

resp.text:
Hi Anna,
We sincerely apologize for your experience here at our salon. We assure you all our technicians are licensed and they are well trained and very experienced. We apologize if our technicians came off as rushing your service as this is never their intentions. We would love to look further into this for you. Can you please contact us at customerservice@anthonyvincenailspa.com? Please include the date & time of service, a copy of your receipt and time stamped pictures of your nails for reference. When we have all this information, we will be glad to move forward to find a resolution for you. Again, our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience we may have caused, we hope it's not too late to reconcile and we hope to hear from you soon!

name: Debra Harris
text: Relaxing spa day! And yes those are my natural nails!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback!

name: Jessi Shores
text: I always have a great experience here! But this last time was more special than ever because my daughter who has never got her nails or toe done came with me and three other family members and we had a very good time. But daughter being able to get hers done for the first time was the best part! Thanks so much your establishment is very appreciated!

resp.text: Thank you for rating your experience!

name: Pure Bliss
text: The customer service was good. The alcohol was good. I just so happened to get a bad pedicure as well as bad nails. The lady was nice and took her time, but a few days later, my feet look like they were never done. Where I got a fill in, you can see the line where the fill in was done through the gel nail polish. It wasn't as noticeable until I got into natural light. I wasted $90. I am hoping they can fix this. I called and I was told that I could just do a walk in for a re-polish. But I'm not sure if they are going to go anything about my feet.

resp.text: Hello, Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry that we weren't able to provide you the best customer service at the time of your visit, and are more than happy to fix everything and make this right for you, including your feet. Please call to get scheduled with us, and ask for our salon manager. Thank you.

name: Alicia T. Watkins
text: Best mani & pedi I had in a long time. 1st visit but everyone was nice, I've been looking for a place in Birmingham. Prices is to be expected since it is next to Saks but not bad. I had an appt so the wait time was non existing. They really take time on you, I didn't get that rushing feeling like other places. Had a lot of options to choose from and good prices for kids. Bathrooms was clean and the place sparkled.

resp.text: Thanks, Alicia! Glad you enjoyed your visit with us.

name: Support Analyst
text: This was the nicest nail spa in Birmingham when it was Venetian Nail Spa. The quality of nail techs have gone down tremendously since becoming Anthony Vince. The atmosphere is even different. Think I’m moving on.

resp.text:
Hello,
We saw that you left us a one-star rating. I'm sorry to see that you didn't have such a pleasant experience as you'd hope. May I ask you to contact customerservice@anthonyvincenailspa.com for any further recommendations or comments that you feel should be passed along to the salon manager? Your comments would help us to become better. Thank you!

name: Rikki Dre
text: This place looks great inside making you think it’s gonna be relaxing with the bar and stuff, however my technician ,Tammy, was super rude to me and was rough with my hands not even saying a word to me, doesn’t even know how to be polite. My nails don’t even look great and she acted like it was the hardest job ever. I called them on the phone to see how much an acrylic fill was with gel and they told me $25, and then after the service I go up to pay and it was $40, they should of specified on the phone. Worst nail place I have ever been to yet. I don’t recommend this place at all.

resp.text: Hi Rikki- Thank you for your feedback. We're sorry for the misunderstanding as our acrylic fill starts off at $25 and addition of gel to any service is an additional $15 as stated on our website. We apologize if you hadn't heard us clearly. We appreciate your comments, and have noted your visit for further review. Thank you for your recent visit.

name: novonda wi
text: Horrible experience! The nail tech who performed services to me was uncompassionate after I told her my index finger was burning while being soaked in acetone. She went on to say that it shouldn’t hurt. I explained apparently there was a cut right above the nail and I didn’t notice until it started to burn. Simply could’ve wrapped that finger with foil instead she got up and walked away from services very angrily and unprofessional. It is apparent no complaining allowed nor any complaints of discomfort should be voice. From the beginning she had a very negative disposition and seemed unhappy in her job. Take pride in what you do and please listen to the customer. I gave this place a lot of my business in the past when it was Venetians. Not sure I’ll return after such a horrible experience. So disappointed.

resp.text:
Hi Novonda,
Thank you for your feedback. Your comments help better our salon, and we will pass along the message to our salon management for further review. We have spoken with the staff member involved in your case, and would like to note that should they had used foil, and acetone to remove the polish, it would still have the same effect as it would still be touching the cut. We apologize if your technician had not been clear about that. Our customer service is very important, and we take all comments seriously. We appreciate your business and hope that you'll consider giving our salon another chance in the future. Thank you.

name: Colleen Hoffman
text: Worst pedicure experience ever. Very rude personnel, technician was rough, chair did not appear to be clean, and could not even sit to let my nails dry because the drying station is also the color choosing spot- literally had 2 girls standing on top of me.

resp.text: We apologize for your experience at our salon and understand your frustration. Due to the layout of our salon, the drying station is a closer to the polish rack. We sincerely apologize if you felt uncomfortable during your visit. We typically accommodate our customers from their station directly to the drying station, however due to Covid, we allow our customers to sit in the waiting area. We were extremely busy during Easter weekend and sincerely apologize if you felt the staff was rude or unwelcoming. We have noted this for management to review. Our salon works hard to provide great customer service and encourage all customers to please communicate at the time of service should you not like your end result so we can fix your nails for you to your liking.

name: Jelisa Williams
text:
I’ve been a loyal customer of this Anthony Vince for about 2 years (previously Venetian Nail Spa). I can honestly say it is a treat  to come here on a regular basis. Here’s why:

1. Great customer service - courteous, timely, and friendly. Everyone makes an effort to know you by name and ensure you’re pleased when you walk out.
2. Nail Quality - While I have my favorite people, everyone is very professional and good at what they do. My nails are beautiful each and every time and I am very picky. My manicurists are almost perfectionists.
3. Atmosphere -  You will feel relaxed here as the salon is beautiful, spacious, and recently renovated. In addition, there’s a bar inside :)
4. Clean - The tools that are used are sanitized and clean. I’ve never suspected anything was not 100% sterilized.

Overall, I highly recommend this nail salon. You will not be disappointed. They’re very consistent and I still feel the same way after 2 years. Enjoy!!

resp.text: Hello Jelisa - We are glad to hear your feedback and appreciate the time you took to review our salon. We will pass along your kind words to salon management. Our goal is that all customers leave happy and satisfied. Hope to see you again!

name: Gage Jaggers
text: My girlfriend and I came here to get manicures and the experience was great. They did a great job applying her acrylics and making sure they were all the same length. 4 stars because I wish the manicure had more substance to it besides exfoliating and moisturizing.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us an review!

name: Debra McMaster
text: As a visitor from England I was truly impressed by the standard of cleanliness and the general ambiance of the set up.  So why 2 stars?  Well think the lady I had was afraid that if she smiled her face might crack!  I was given hand gestures to take my hand out of setting machine rather than simple words. And at $37 for a simple shellac manicure I expected better service.

resp.text:
Hi Debra,
We're sorry to hear your manicurist wasn’t personal during your visit. We will reach out to the salon management and will properly train our staff to ensure that it would not happen again. Once again, we apologize for the experience.

name: Amy Frederickson
text: I have been a patron of this nail salon since it opened a little over a year ago and I have always had excellent service, and will never go anywhere else. I’ll be honest, I am EXTREMELY picky when it comes to my nails; even the smallest of flaws will have me refiling, or most likely, ripping off a full set of gel nails within minutes of leaving a salon. I am so incredibly picky that I simply stopped going to the nail salon, preferring bitten nails and ragged cuticles to the stress of inconsistent results and the anticipated disappointment. While still scarred from past failures and short comings, this is the ONLY nail salon in Birmingham metro area that I will patron. The staff is professional, the salon clean and well maintained, and the nail service has always met and/or exceeded my expectations—lasting weeks on end with the correct shape, color, and length, all without bloody gashes and cuts from careless manicurists. If you’re skeptical and/or traumatized from lackluster salons in the area, this one is worth trying!

resp.text: Hello Amy- Thank you for taking time out to write us a review. We appreciate all of your support, and are happy to provide you with wonderful service! We look forward to your next visit with us!

name: Karin Brew
text: A nice nail salon and the service is great . The nail tech he was nice but my gel nails didn’t last a week without chipping. For $50 it should lasted three weeks. Being in the Summit you would think differently. Sorry Sang the nail tech. This want happen again. Hello Sun nails.

resp.text:
Hi Karin-
We're sorry to hear about your nails! Our gel is guaranteed, and we would be more than happy to accommodate to a fix within seven days from your service date. Please reach out to our salon directly so that we can schedule you in for that fix. Again, we're so sorry to hear about your chip and look forward to hearing from you!

name: Ashley Greer
text:
I had a pedicure and some nails are not fully covered and my big nail isn’t even smooth. Definitely will not be back and do not recommend this salon!
They failed to mention that the drink that was “complimentary” was only for services of $60! so when he asked if I would like a drink I said sure, what do you have? I chose one and later found out it was $7!! For ONE drink!!

resp.text: Hello Ashley- We're sorry to hear about all the misunderstanding. The complimentary drink was indeed for any pedicure services, and I apologize that our staff told you differently. We are sorry for any inconvenience. Regarding your pedicure service. We encourage all customers to please speak up during their service to fix any nails to satisfaction prior to leaving so that all customers leave happy. Will you please private message us a picture of your nails to customerservice@anthonyvincenailspa.com We will definitely look into this for you!

name: Hannah Donaldson
text: Visited today for a pedicure and gel nails and my toes look horrible and the guy was very rough, hurting me multiple times. I paid $83 to have to go to a different salon tomorrow to pay more to get my toes fixed.

resp.text: Hi Hannah- We're so sorry to hear that you left our salon displeased with your service. Our staff work hard to provide excellent customer service. Should your experience not be as great, we encourage all customers to please speak up prior to leaving our salon so our staff can fix your nails for you. Our staff would have fixed it for no charge. Please contact our salon directly for any fixes that may be made. Thank you.

name: Quinecia Allen
text: Attentive  nail technicians got powder dip manicure 💅🏾 and gel pedicure yesterday nails already cracking also didn’t get complimentary drink.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review!

name: Anna Bird
text: I’ve been here several times and have had great experiences. However, the last manicure and pedicure  I had here was the worst I’ve ever had.  We were rushed through our service, my hands were cut up to the point they were bleeding and the polish was put on poorly. The woman doing my manicure was very short with me and was pulling on my hands and arms during the whole service. I also did not like that they did the manicure and pedicure at the same time. They rushed through the massage as well. It was extremely unrelaxing.  When I called to tell the manager, he was unapologetic, rude on the phone and did not offer to do anything about it. I will never go back. It was awful.

resp.text:
Hello Anna-
We're sorry to hear that your service was not as great as you had hoped for. text:

Two stars because it was clean and facilities are nice.  Services do not measure up to atmosphere or price.

resp.text: Hello Heather, Firstly, we'd like to apologize for any inconvenience regarding your displeased service. Our main goal is customer service, and we're sadden to hear that you left unhappy. Our basic regular pedicure service includes Nail trimming, shaping, buffing, cuticle grooming, callus treatment, lotion massage, hot towel wrap and your choice of polish. This treatment also includes the use of a pumice bar, however it's not guaranteed to take off much dead skin, and we do provide services for extra callus removal treatment should you had asked for it. As for your gel manicure, our company policy allows for fixes for gel manicures to be done within seven days of your initial service date. We encourage all customers to speak up or to immediately call the salon directly and ask to speak to our salon manager within seven days to fix any nails that need to be fixed from peeling or chips. Secondly, The ATM is actually owned by an outside vendor. We make absolutely no commission off the machine and have the machine in the salon for the convenience of customers if they wish to use it. Our cash tip policy is in place to maximize the efficiency of our salon so that gratuities are given directly to the techs without any other transactions or questions. Credit cards tips have to manually input an error occasionally happen which can’t be solved quickly. We apologize again for any inconvenience this may have put upon you.

Our pricing is competitive rate, as well as standard in your area. Again, we do apologize and have noted your comments and have passed them to our salon management for further review.

name: _Spunky _Shari_Esq
text:
Greetings,

I have been a consistent customers over the years at Venetian Nail Salon, which was recently bought by your organization. Today I went to your store to receive a pedicure but instead left disgruntled and frustrated. I entered your store first and two women after me were seated prior to me. I am African American and the customers sat before me were Caucasian.

The attendant attempted to argue I was still selecting my nail polish—which is innacurate—as reason for them sitting first. However, I had selected my polish and was ready to be seated at the time of the oversight.
The solution and purpose of this message is to bring awareness to how customers should be treated and while I am aware mistakes happen and not every oversight is racially charged, your attendantʼs response to me bringing the oversight to his attention and deciding not to retain your services was way below the expectations of any business I want to patron.

I ask that you incorporate a more uniform system of seating clients and promote a more inclusive environment and that could start by having more diverse art work on the wall. This could prevent other potential clients from leaving your establishment with the impression that someone elseʼs dollars are valued to a higher degree.

Albeit this email may fall on deaf ears, and maybe you are satisfied with poor customer service but with the availability of social media and more platforms available to share experiences such as these it would behoove you to have higher customer service standards.

resp.text:
Hi Sharidan,
I previously messaged you through e-mail. Please check your inbox.
Thank you

text: The staff  needs to ask more info on the phone prior to your appointment.  When you get there they tell you the doctors only there Thursday .

text: I had a microdermabrasion facial. It was awesome. They had me in right on time and the girl was very nice and professional. My skin felt wonderful!!! I also had the B12 shots and was able to walk in and out with virtually no wait time.

name: Terri Thompson
text: Was badly burned by esthetician and received permanent damage during laser hair removal in 2015. No remedial action was taken on the clinic's part so I had to file complaints with BBB, Alabama Board of Cosmetology and because the owner is a chiropractor, had to file a complaint with the Alabama Board of Chiropractic Examiners. He was put on 5 years probation and fined several thousand dollars for unprofessional conduct and for performing services outside the scope of a chiropractic license--if the fine isn't paid by the deadline, his license will be suspended for that period of time. Do not recommend this clinic for laser services. None of my expenses (doctor, cosmetics, or even the botched laser service) were reimbursed by the clinic.

name: Ciearra Jackson
text: Enjoyed the staff and the service! Everyone was so friendly and efficient. The environment is so inviting. I didn't have just tremendous results with iLipo, but then again I did not increase my physical activity. However, the staff was great during the process, and I felt very informed about the procedure. I have a message waiting, and I can't wait to have some time away from work to use it. I definitely recommend Growing Younger to anyone in the Huntsville area.

name: Nyla Blakley

Staff so friendly and reassuring. Everyone is so professional and I highly recommend.

name: Sandra Wilson
text:
Had a special running.
I had originally wanted an anti aging facial.
Tech talked me out of it, because of my skin condition. Opted for microdermabrasion.
She paid more attention to my forehead..didnt go near my folds around my nose.
Be prepared to fill out your medical life on paper, and then have them not look at it.
We did not do a full hour, which was the time that was suppose to be allotted.
As soon as the tech was tipped, she be lined to the employees office.
Certainly didnt feel very welcome or appreciated for my patronage.

name: Olivia Colvin
text:
I love this place! Think I stumbled upon this gem from Groupon originally. The staff is friendly, the place is impeccably clean every visit (I’ve been here about 6-7 times now.) Thus far I have only used their b-12 shots spartically for managing my anemia, but I love that I can get in and out every time, no appointment and longest I’ve ever waited was maaaybe five minutes! They offer unique monthly specials for a wide variety of services (massages, shots, facial treatments, non invasive body contouring) and never ever try to upsell me anything. I wish they offered more vitamin injection options, but that’s just me.

For the record, I am pretty sure that I have brought anywhere from one to three children with me at any given time and never once has the staff been rude or unwelcoming in the least (or maybe I just have that “Don’t even think about it” look down better than I thought!) I appreciate that as a mother I don’t get annoyed looks from the staff just for walking in the door.

Definitely looking forward to continuing my visits here for b12 and thinking about trying other treatments/services with this place in the future!

name: Amber Litteken
text: Everyone is very professional. Lazer hair removal is 100% worth it.

name: A. Zachery
text: I called to see if I could reschedule my appointment because I didn't want to be late, but I couldn't. The Groupon had already been redeemed by the business and there was a 24 hour cancellation policy. I understand the policy but why was my Groupon redeemed before services were rendered. When I finally got there through traffic, they said that I would only have 20 minutes for a massage.  I politely said ,"Thats okay, it's been a long week and my birthday is tomorrow. Dont worry about it."  So I left and I was a little hurt by the customer service I had received at this point and I went back in to ask if they were apart of the BBB, because at this point I saw where this was going.  The young lady at the front was really rude toward me and so was the man who is a massage therapists. I have scoliosis and I was looking for some relief for my birthday. I'm African American and I am just wondering if I wasn't, if it would've made a difference at all. I called to ask about the policy because I want to be treated fairly. The phone disconnected while I was asking and when I called back it went to voicemail. I called back from a different number and the phone was answered then it was passed to a man works there and he was even more rude than the young lady working at the front. I was in shock how fast he got annoyed with me and I wasn't being disrespectful at all. He then said that if I called back he would file harassment charges against me, then hung up me in my face. As a first time customer, I felt like I was treated really badly. I will not be going back to this business EVER AGAIN and I pray that justice is served for how I was treated.

name: Cassandra Henry
text: I have truly enjoyed Growing Younger for several services. I recommend Growing Younger to ALL my colleagues and friends.  Darlicia and Trista and just simply amazing. They made me feel so comfortable.  My husband comments every day that he notices the results of the ilipo ultra!!  I cannot express enough how much I value the experience I've had at Growing Younger.

text: I visited Growing Younger a few times for i-Lipo treatments. I was very impressed by the friendly staff; they were professional, knowledgeable, and willing to answer all of my questions. I appreciated the appearance/ decor and cleanliness of the facilities. I look forward to future visits.

After she cleansed my face, she dried it with what felt like a paper towel, and I don't know about y'all but a paper towel being scraped across your face after you just had a "vacuum" scrape it, is not comfortable. The microdermabrasion part itself was fine. But the before and after how she cleansed and dried my face was not ideal. I feel like they used very low quality moisturizers and lotions. I was surprised they didn't use any serums.

name: Amber Harwell
text: I have received Botox plenty of times. My first experience with Growing Younger was a month ago and I received what they recommended I needed which was twice as much as I normally got at my other doctor. After a month I noticed that it was already wearing off. So I go back in and Dr. Wagner seemed very frustrated and stormed off and came back with Botox to fix the problem. I have never felt such pain while receiving Botox and hours later I still have a terrible headache. I’m pretty sure he took his frustration out on my forehead! Not only did I think their Botox was deluted but they also overcharged me $111.00. They charged me for 10 extra units that I never recieved. When I mentioned my refund they wanted to do a “store credit”. After refusing the store credit Dr. Wagner said “Well what do you want??” I replied my money back on my card! He refunded my money and I nicely said thank you. He replied yep and I walked out. Such a rude and awkward visit! I can’t believe he actually thought I would want to return back to use my $111 of store credit after he acted the way he did.

name: Debra Mears
text: Went in because I noticed the Botox walk in Thursday flags and was about to leave in a couple weeks for my 60th Birthday trip. I got Botox and Juvederm done on my face. I would NEVER go back there or recommend them for either treatment. I had to go back a week later because the side of my mouth was caving in and they added more Juvederm. They said they had used a full syringe on me which I don't believe because the last place I had it done only used a half with better results! The BIG problem is  they said they used 40 units of Botox which last time I only got 20, they did not ask how many units I wanted! My eyes are practically closed and I can't open them. You can't see my eyelids at all and I can't raise my eyes up. Instead of looking better for my trip I looked awful with my nearly closed eyes. Everyone that knows me asked what did you do to your eyes??? Thank GOD Botox does not last to long and I'm praying this is a temporary result that will go back to normal. I thought they would be cheaper but they were the same price as my plastic surgeon only faster to walk in. I will wait to get an appointment with a professional surgeon next time. Not worth messing with my vision!

text: I'm  regular with Manon. She's so fast, and does a great job! I've never had a bad experience! I would not go anywhere else. Customer service is GREAT!!!!

name: Emily Daleo
text: I received a certificate for a massage for Christmas and decided to go ahead and schedule the massage. They made the appointment for 3:00 on a Friday. On Wednesday, they called to tell me that they had double booked my appointment, and ask me to come in at a different time on Friday. I was not able to come in at that time, so I had them schedule an appointment for the next Friday at 3:00. When I walked into the spa, I was told that I was not on the schedule. They don't send confirmations of your appointment, and they don't call to remind you of your appointment. Apparently, they really just have trouble booking your appointment at all. Not exactly the kind of experience I want from a spa, and I won't be trying to reschedule again.

resp.text: This was an unfortunate event that we took very seriously. We issued a complete refund of the gift certificate and offered a free 90 minute massage. All clients who are on our schedule receive either a text message or phone call the day before their appointment. We take pride in giving the very best customer service.

text: I went to have a trial of my hair and make up and it took 2 hrs for my hair alone and I was not happy with the outcome. They hadn't booked enough time from the beginning. I wanted natural looking makeup, but it is caked on and not flattering. I went here after I saw all the positive reviews, but I did not have a positive experience! I'm so glad I tried before my wedding day as the whole thing stressed me out and it's not even the big day!

resp.text: At Ambiance it's our goal to make every Bride feel and look beautiful on her wedding day! During the consultation we strive to find the best hair and make up style with the client for her Big Day. The trial run is very important to us and sometimes it takes longer than anticipated because we want the client to be happy. Therefore, we offer a second complementary trial run! We regret you were not satisfied and we hope you will come back for your complementary trial run to perfect your look.

name: Marina Schroeder
text: I went in for a wax, the facility gives an outward appearance of being very clean and calming, and the employees are all very pleasant, however they double dip the wax! By this I mean they put the same stick that they've put on your body back into the wax (which is not hot enough to kill bacteria that resides on your skin), and unless they change the wax every time a new customer comes in (unlikely, and very expensive), you're getting everyone else's microorganisms on your body, yuck! Not only is this extremely unhygienic and disgusting, it's also illegal. Will not be returning here.

resp.text: Here at Ambiance Spalon we are committed to offering you the cleanest experience in town. We sanitize every room and every utensil after every service. Double dipping is a No No! When you come to Ambiance we guarantee a safe environment for all our customers.

She’s very friendly & will talk to you throughout the wax to keep you distracted. No bumps, no burns from the wax, & no regrowth for at least 2 weeks! Could not have asked for a better experience!!

text: I made an appointment on Valentines Day, Feb 14, 2013. I had never been to Ambiance Spalon before. However, Laura Beth that is a hair & color stylist had done my hair for 8 years when I lived in Rome, Ga from 2003-2011. I was moving to Charleston, Sc and she was moving to Auburn, Al. Although I was excited to be moving to Charleston I wasn't excited about having to find a new hair stylist. Every time she would do my hair when I would get home my husband would always say your hair looks nice. When she was No longer doing my hair it looked nice but I never got the compliments that I use to get when Laura Beth was doing my hair. Every time I would go get my hair done I would think I sure wish Laura Beth was still doing my hair i missed her. My husband started looking for a new job and we found out we were moving to Newnan,Ga. I started thinking, I wonder how far she is from where I was moving to. I got on Mapquest and it was 76 miles. I didn't care, it was worth every mile I drove for her to be doing my hair again. Ambiance is a very nice place and everyone there is very friendly. I met the owners that day and they are really nice. You won't regret going to Ambiance and getting Laura Beth to do your hair. Best decision I ever made to drive 76 miles to get my hair done. Worth every mile.

name: Shawn Reaves
text:
WORST SPA EXPERIENCE OR LACK THEREOF THAT I HAVE EVER HAD!!!

I made an appointment for a brazilian wax Friday morning because they had a great web special going for $39, upon which I specifically asked the owner did they do guys and was it ok. The owner said not a problem and let the receptionist make the appointment for Tuesday of the following week. On Monday I get a call around noon and informed they do not do guys and that she was "sorry"....Why did she make the appointment in the first place?

Now I tried to call around Auburn but no one has any appointments open for the the next day on such short notice. Now their policy is to deduct half the price of your service if you give them less than 24 hours notice, yet what do I get when they give me less than 24 hours notice....nothing!!! The point is I counted on them to provide a service that they said they would and now Im left having to travel out of town possible to get waxed.

A word of advice to Ambiance Spalon...if your going to advertise you might want to say no guys or girls only on your ad so in the future this doesnt happen!! And how about reimbursing me for the extra money I had to pay someone else for waxing because I relied on your business.

text: As a guy who is picky about how my hair is cut, it has been super hard to find someone to do it right. I feel like I tried so many different barber shops and salons hoping to find one that works. Well I found one and that was Capelli Salon. All the ladies at the salon are a great and welcoming. I’ve been going here for a few months now and it is just a great environment all around. I am glad that I found this place. I would recommend this salon to any guy ( or girl ) looking to have their hair done right you will not be disappointed!!!

Wonderful place!!
Emma did an awesome job on myself and my family members love her too!

name: Karen Pruitt
text: Love the folks at Capelli!  Always a treat getting my hair styled by Betsy! ❤

name: Regina Gargollo
text: First time visit - I called them in the morning to see if I can get a balayage that day and they said yes. Very easy to set a same day appointment. Emma did a fantastic job! I will be coming back for sure.

name: Lisa Phillips
text: I walked in to the salon on a referral from a friend. The scariest thing it sitting down in a chair and hoping the stylist can "read your mind" and "capture the same vision" you have for your hair. She didn't know me, my personality, or what I liked or didn't like. I was nervous...what if she messed it up? What if I didn't like it? Immediately I was at ease. Everyone was so sweet and the atmosphere was very professional, clean, and calming. Not only did I get a GREAT haircut, I immediately knew I would be back for my color appointment. Another perk--no drama among the stylists! Professional yet friendly! I have even referred a friend there now and she had the same great experience. Best form of advertising is word of mouth! So glad I was referred to Capelli!

name: Amy Gable
text: I overheard a woman talking about getting her hair done here, and she looked great, so I looked it up and booked an appointment. I’ve been back 3 times and absolutely love it! They did a great job! I’ve has Kelly and Kathryn both do my hair.

name: Inmi Brandsema
text: I’ve always had great cuts and service for the past 2 years. The the salon is very flexible and I have always been able to make an same day appointment. I usually see Jerri or Julia. They are great. About a week ago, I saw someone else and I had a terrible experience. Part of it was on me since I did not specify my hair type (long and thick hair) but they also never ask. The stylist seems to be stressed about how long it was going to take to cut my hair. She did not attend to the details and how you can see every layer in my hair if you don’t cut it properly. She ran out of time before her next appointment and sent me to someone else to finish drying my hair. She never came back to check on her work. It was so choppy and uneven. I was so upset about my service. I went to a different salon to get it fixed. Sadly, I will not be returning to Capelli.

name: Bernadette Fraser
text: Very professional & nice personnel, always helpful with good advises, I love the way how beautiful and tidy the rooms are. You will feel very well treated (spoiled) after a visit. 100% recommend

name: Debbie Faris
text: I brought my sister here in July 2016.  I requested a cut/style and highlights and my sister got just a cut and style.  I showed my stylist (Julia) a photo of what I wanted prior to her starting.   When we were finished my hair looked nothing like the cut or highlights I requested.  My sister was very unhappy with her cut also (Katherine did hers).  Both of us had very chopped up cuts which were not the same from one side to the other.  We had negative comments from both friends and strangers who saw our hair later.  Neither of us could style our hair to make it look presentable.  I ended up cutting my own hair and my sisters to clean up the mess.  We were then able to style our hair better and got approval from friends and family.  For me this was the worst professional cut I ever got.

Our staff was told to ‘lower our prices’ so that Capelli could make more money & skip helping our cause. The staff there are racist, uneducated, shallow & care nothing about the community- just money! Go anywhere else! Their prices are as big of a joke as their politricks. Imagine flaking on a cancer organization- patients eager to see pictures, eager to read posts, but denied over Capelli’s interest in money.

name: Britney Morgan
text: I have been using Brazilian wax by Marci for three years now. When I first started I had one lady I always went to and she was awesome. It was only after they reopened after they closed for covid that I started to have issues. They would call me the day before to tell me they had to cancel my appointment. Now its like my new person is always gone and I am not sure what is going on. Marci seems like she doesn't care. Now I just think I need to find somewhere else because all the seasoned people are gone or are never there. The prices are great don't get me wrong but I just cant keep being treated like this. My coworkers and I are all feeling this way. We just think its time we started searching around.

name: Shana Curry
text: I have no complaints. From the receptionist to the serviced received.  I will advise that once you've found the right person, stick with them.  You may have to go between a few ladies, but you'll find the one who is perfected for you.

text: They do not know how to properly wax Black hair. I now have a keloid in my bikini area and patches of hair were left. Very upset.

text: I went into purchase a gift card for my wife. The receptionist told me she didn’t know how to do that. She could find out, but it would take a really long time. I called the other location, I was put on hold and no one returned to the phone. This is the first time leaving a negative review for any business and I hate doing it.

name: Teresa York
text: I have been using Brazilian Wax by Marci for over 2 years. I’ve always had a great experience until my last wax 2 weeks ago. The esthetician left bruises all over my legs as well as patches of hair. I sent a text message along with pictures and was told Marci would be following up with me. She never followed up with me.  While I wasn’t happy with the waxing my biggest complaint is the lack of customer service. You would think the owner would have followed up. I’m not excited about leaving a negative review, I really was hoping Marci would have done the right thing.

name: Faith Shaw
text: It is ridiculous that no one can answer the phone to make an appointment. It takes less than two minutes. The service here is terrible.

name: Ashia Lockhart
text: I’ve been a customer for 2 years. All of the ladies are awesome! However, I book my appointments with the same wax technician each time. They use quality wax, are always clean, and are very knowledgeable about pre-wax and post-wax care. In addition, The price is one of the cheapest if not THE CHEAPEST price in town. I treat myself to a service every 5-6 weeks!

name: Carolyn Adkins
text: Spa is very clean and nice. Staff are friendly and helpful. As for the waxing experience, it depends on who you get. Some aestheticians are very gentle, and some a little more rough. If you find one you like, stick with her!

name: IndiaCian
text: Book Rebeca ❣️ She is the best she got me in and out. The wax was painless and she kept me distracted.

name: Michelle l Finney
text: Marci has two beautiful locations and is so knowledgeable about hair removal and care. I have been a client for over three years and I now live a thousand miles away. I drive or fly into Birmingham to be waxed by Marci. She is so efficient and I will never let anyone else wax me. Her two locations in Vestavia and Hoover are beautiful, comfortable and clean. Marci has a wealth of knowledge that she shares about pre and post waxing care as well as getting you in a regular schedule that is perfect for your hair growth. I cannot day enough good things about her.

text: Ive just began Brazilian waxes a few months ago. I was nervous and almost canceled but I pushed through. Suzanne made me feel comfortable and she was very quick! I still have to psych myself up for it but by the time Suzanne is done talking to me, it's over! Going to try other services soon.

She was patient with me and made me feel extremely comfortable. She talked to me and warned me before every big rip, which I appreciated. So I will definitely recommend. The environment was squeaky clean and the staff as very friendly. Well definitely be booking monthly from now on.

name: Jack Blodgett
text: They are the only place I found that will do a Brazilian wax on a Man.  I love my Brazilian wax that was done by Marci.  This was my very first time getting a Brazilian wax done.  They are very professional.  I had it done right about Thanksgiving and everything is still nice and smooth with next to hardly any skin reactions.  I would highly recommend them for a Brazilian on a man, and already have an appointment to go back.  I'm planning on taking my Wife there to get her a Brazilian wax too.  I also plan on getting my armpits done if they do that, which I would imagine they do.  5 stars from me.  Thank you Marci :)

text: I love everything about this wax spa. I've been going here for nearly two years and the staff is always nice and everything is always so clean. The prices are very reasonable and you can always guarantee the service will be good.

name: Deede's World
text:
They are amazing people and do great work. I love it. I am a regular.
I have to say that it's not to expensive and we'll worth the money. I hate hair bumps, stubble, itching and pain they stopped all that the day I started getting waxed. I just want to thank all the staff for helping me with this issue... I exfoliate with their products and my skin feels lovely.
I advise anyone to try them out. The staff is so sweet and make you feel so comfortable. The wait is not long and the service you will be satisfied with for sure.

I wanted to update since I am still a very happy customer. Jordan has been taking care of me for some time now and i just want everyone to know she is amazing and caring.
Ask for Jordan you will not be disappointed.

text: It's a Must. I'm very satisfied everytime I go. Great place for all your needs.

name: Nikki Duncan
text: Had my first experience here over the weekend and it was great. I came in about 15 minutes early and they were able to take me before my appointment time. I had Brooke and she was absolutely wonderful. It was my very first time and she made it so comfortable. She was hilarious too. I will definitely be back!

name: Miss Angie “Miss. Angie”
text: Best wax!

name: Crystal Swann
text: I was terrified going in because I had a really bad and painful experience with sugar waxing.  Kaylene got me in very quickly and it was the least painful and best experience I have ever had!  Will never go back yo sugar waxing!  I have super sensitive skin and was able to get a full body wax without the “sensitive skin” aftermath.  She was very proficient and very knowledgeable in her work!  Will definitely be a return client and highly recommend!  The staff was very friendly and very accommodating!  Clean environment and very professional atmosphere.  If you ever want a great experience with minimal pain involved, definitely go see Kaylene!  Thanks again!!

name: Alisha Underwood
text: Since I ran into my girl Shelby... She been hooking my Brazilian up! I'm clear and ready to go in minutes! Professional Services Spa all the way around! I Love This Place!!!!

name: Tiara Bell
text: Ahh man, honestly I can say I’ve tried a few different wax places and I never thought I’d leave EWC but one of my coworkers insisted I go to BWC by Marci in Vestavia because of the price differential yet her always outstanding experience and satisfaction. I’ve been coming for months now and I only see Kaileen I don’t even know what the others look like lol. Kaileen is an absolute pleasure she’s always enthusiastic and always updating me on the best shows to watch and giving me the best pre and after care tips for my skin. Gotta love the experience, she’s become like family every time I go it’s like a therapy session. You won’t regret it!

name: brandon lawley
text: Wife went there and she enjoyed it!

name: Whitney Jackson
text: Very good and the educate you in the service and products they sell.

name: Christen McKinney
text: The absolute best! Had my 3rd Brazilian wax experience here with Stephanie. The first 2 at 2 different other places were absolutely awful. As uncomfortable and somewhat embarrassing as the whole thing can be, I appreciate Stephanie being thorough, efficient, talking to me to make me comfortable and for explaining the process and the aftercare. And it took all of 20 minutes maybe. I scheduled my next appointment after paying, but they took me as a walk in with only a 10 minute wait. I will recommend them to anyone and will never go anywhere else going forward.

name: Ro'Lencia BOstic
text: Very sweet, informative and professional.. I would recommend this establishment.

text: Great food, great atmosphere, great location.

text: Marci is the best hands down. She remembers her customers and is always a joy to talk to during your service.

text: Horrible customer service, the receptionist is very rude in person and when answering the phone. They may provide great wax services although I will never know due to the person they have working up front. I rather spend my money somewhere else.

name: Ashley Geneva
text:
Best service ever! I’ve been all over the world and sometimes I need a touch up while traveling. Marci was recommended by 3 women I know so I decided to try her out. No one will EVER wax me again Marci is my official spa.

Now I did have a little burn on my stomach but that’s my fault I didn’t realize or tell Marci how hot the wax was.

name: Vicki Mae
text: It was a wonderful experience, Jordan was very professional and quick. It was my first time but she made me feel comfortable about the process. The receptionist was nice and the spa was clean and nicely decorated. I’ll definitely recommend.

I called ahead to ask if my skin would be an issue as well as several other questions because this was all new to me. Marci answered everything and made me very confident this was a great place to try. I'm so glad I went and continue to go. The staff from the moment you walk in to leaving is very kind and professional. I recommend anyone to go here :)

name: Divine Jones
text: It's my very first time ever getting a Brazilian wax i was very nervous almost called and canceled but I'm glad I didn't .Ashley was very nice so was so good I already schedule next appointment
