text: Always a good experience!!

name: Haley Walters
text: good wax, hair didn't seem to grow as quick in just some places but better than past experiences with wax especially with very minimum ingrowns. price is normal as other places, wish there was a student discount or something. not too busy of a place, just call ahead the day before. got a Brazilian but they missed a whole lot on the backside because of the position.

name: Rebecca Hosselton
text:
I've been coming here for a year now and I've had nothing but GREAT customer service. Very clean, friendly, and affordable!

ASK for Brooke! She is the bomb! Everyone here is great, though. You can't go wrong with anyone you are booked with!

name: JustBeingDrè _
text: They do great work and the price is more than reasonable, but I don’t like that they advertise walk-in availability, but anytime I’ve ever needed to “walk in” they say they are booked and don’t have even try to fit me in.  This has happened at both locations. Normally I have an appointment, but the the two times I went to walk in, I did not get services.

name: Wendy B
text: Natalie is great! Keri is THE BEST. this new girl at the front desk... not very friendly or professional. I wish people understood that the face of the company is the receptionist and she determines whether money is spent there or if it will walk right back out the door. if I hadn't ever been here before and hadn't met any of the estheticians, I'd assume they were like her and would not feel comfortable going here.

name: Joy Albano
text: Kaylene is the best. Wouldn't see anyone else. Great staff, great results and very knowledgeable. If you want it good, go to Marci and see Kaylene

name: Angi B
text: I've been going here for quite a while to see Shelby and she never disappoints me! I really like this place

name: Dani Jones
text: I love that this is a locally own business. The people are really nice and professional. I always get the Brazilian wax. I love the products that they use. I would definitely recommend going here.

name: DeAndra Brown
text:
Great Prices. Allison is ALWAYS great. However, this new receptionist team is sub par. Customer service, and telephone etiquette has certainly diminished.  They are the front line of the business. text: I have been coming to this place since I moved back to Birmingham in December. Price was very reasonable. Everything had been going good until they hired a new receptionist name Clare who clearly doesn't know what she's doing. My appt was at 9a. I called as soon as they opened to let them know that I would be 5-10 mins late due to the severe thunderstorm. (37 weeks pregnant, I'm not going to drive like a bat out of hell all the way across town) Clare said for me to get there as soon as I could & they would work something out. I got there at 915a she checked me in & told me my appt was at 920. I assumed they switched my time since I was late, right? I waited for about 5 mins before Well another guest was checked in & she got called back within 2 mins. Natalie said that she didn't know I was waiting & she had already called her client to the back. I informed her that I had a 10a appt & if they could have me finish prior then I didn't mind waiting. She never came back to the front. So Its now 930a I asked Clare what was the plan (since I sat there for another 5 mins) & she told me "you're gonna wait another 5-10 mins & Natalie will be with you) Marci had just told her not to switch me around and it would only be 5-10mins. Well it's 950a now & Natalie just came back to the front & they're still discussing what to do with me. But not communicating with me AT ALL! I listened for 3 more mins before I just got up and walked out. I understand that I was 15 mins late, but 1) I called ahead of time to inform them 2) when I got there I was told my appt was at 920a for Mekeia. 3) if i wasn't going to be able to be served then just tell me that . don't have me just sitting there waiting & then tell me what I'm "Going To Do" . & not communicate with me at all. Oh I forgot to mention that Clare claims she had my name wrong. Not paying attention to detail, not using common sense, nor providing great customer service. I WONT BE GOING BACK! they all have Bad attitudes , except for Brook. :)

name: Marie E
text: After a horrible experience at another place that does sugaring, I came here. Thank God for L.A. Bikini! They completely redeemed my sugaring experience! The woman who did my sugaring had something like 10 or more years doing it, and it was evident! The whole thing was comfortable, hygienic, and hardly painful. I highly recommend them! P.S. - Sugaring > waxing!

name: Katie Beaman
text:
I went in for my first Brazilian sugaring after having tried wax a few times. From the moment I walked in the door, the staff was incredibly kind, professional, and friendly while helping me fill out their questionnaire and confirming my appointment time. The waiting area was very clean. I brought my cardiac alert dog in with me, and the staff was so courteous and understanding! Usually when trying new places, I’ll have to field some access issues - but not here! They were welcoming to both me and my service dog.

When it was time for my appointment, Elizabeth came to escort me to a room and was very attentive and friendly. She mentioned giving me some extra time to get my dog situated (he was in a down-stay out of the way for the whole appointment). Little things like that make the experience for me!

She made sure I was decent before opening the door to come in, and then began by answering any lingering questions I had about sugaring. We talked about the differences between wax and sugaring, and she walked me through how it would feel before beginning. She was so professional and welcoming - at no point did I ever feel any judgement or anything! She made me feel so comfortable and kept the conversation very light and it really felt like I was catching up with a friend. She made sure I liked the results and offered to tweak the triangle I preferred she leave to straighten it a bit more, then offered me some wipes to get any left over sugar if I felt it while redressing.

At the front, they helped sign me up for the membership - which was a fantastic deal! Instead of being around $60, I could pay $70 and have unlimited bikini sugaring for the month plus discounted other services. I’m currently scheduled for my second appointment and can’t wait! Not only did the staff make me feel more welcomed than I have ever felt in a beauty salon, but the sugaring itself was much less painful and I like how I only need to wait two weeks for touch ups.

Will absolutely be returning!!

I asked why I would sign up for a membership that I didnt use and then she insisted she didn’t know why people did stupid things. With 2 new actual spas opening up I would definitely recommend giving them a try and skipping this business.

text: Purchased an account good for six months and showed up, on time, to all of my appointments in that frame. Was told that if I showed up more than five minutes late, I would not be seen and would be charged for not showing. As a dentist, I understand the frustration and need for consequence for clients who show up notably late, consistently. However, to send away and charge a reliable, compliant client is absolutely asinine. Do not use them.

We try our best to get all clients in, however we do have a cancellation policy of 5 minutes due to having our appointments booked back to back.
